author: cnbc.com
title: Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited Announces Financial Results for First Quarter Ended March 30,
text:
Three months ending: 3/30/2018 3/31/2017 Net product sales $36,150,000 $31,727,000 Income from operating activities(*) 1,984,000 1,449,000 Net income for the period 1,097,000 1,002,000 Total comprehensive income for the period 1,656,000 866,000 Earnings per share Basic $0.10 $0.09 Diluted $0.10 $0.09 (*) Earnings from operations is before interest, foreign exchange, equity interest, other income and taxes NOTE: The interim financial results have not been reviewed by an auditor GUELPH, Ontario, April 30, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --
To all employees and shareholders:
Our markets are up over previous quarters and we are working hard to meet the demand.
Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited manufactures a broad range of products for the electronic and electrical products industry, including metallic and non-metallic enclosures, racks, small cases, outlet strips, surge suppressors and electronic transformers.
For information, contact:
Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited
Robert F. Hammond, Chairman and CEO
Tel. (519) 822-2960
Fax. (519) 822-7289
Email: ir@hammfg.com
Source: Hammond Manufacturing Company Limited
